/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy streets. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses are scattered throughout the scene, hinting at the constant movement and energy of the city. The street itself is lined with trees and street lamps, adding elements of nature and light to the urban setting.
